This website is AudioEye enabled and is being optimized for accessibility. To open the AudioEye Toolbar, press "shift + =". Some assistive technologies may require the use of a passthrough function before this keystroke. For more information, activate the button labeled "Explore your accessibility options".

  4. Tim Abrahamson

Tim Abrahamson

Tim Abrahamson, Position 7

Email Tim Abrahamson

Term Information


Elected January 1, 2026 - December 31, 2029 

Occupation

Healthcare Administrator for Diligence and Integration

Education

  • Master of Science in Healthcare Administration (2016)
  •  Bachelor of Science in Professional Arts, Healthcare Administration (2006)

Family

Tim, his wife Stephanie and their 2 adult children all moved to Arlington in 2020 after serving nearly 30 years in the United States Army.

Hobbies

Tim enjoys long-distance running, gardening, and exploring fermentation science.


Community Involvement

Tim served on the Arlington City Planning Commission from April 2024 to December 2025, where he contributed to civic planning and community development initiatives. Tim is also an active volunteer and foster for Purrfect Pals Cat Adoption Center.
